description.value:
You send a wave of brilliant light outward from this shield to illuminate the darkness.

Arms Slot: Any Shield - Uncommon

Power ✦ Encounter (Minor Action)

Effect: Close blast 5. The blast creates a zone of bright light that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you are no longer holding the shield. When you move, the zone moves with you, keeping the same orientation. Undead creatures grant combat advantage while in the zone. Once per round during your turn, you can reorient the zone as a free action.

Power ✦ Daily (Minor Action)

Effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you are no longer holding the shield. Any undead enemy that ends its turn in the aura takes 2 radiant damage. At night, the aura also sheds bright light in a column that extends upward, stopped only by blocking terrain.
